extension.description: KOver (for KODI Overlay) offers a different approach of KODI skins. Not just purely designed, it also offers to the user the possibility to customize it and make thousands of configurations. KOver embeds two powerful WYSIWYG editors : The Designer and the Color tool. Move, resize, change content and colors ... make it yours !

KOver (for KODI Overlay) offers a different approach of KODI skins. Not just purely designed, it also offers to the user the possibility to customise it and make thousands of configurations. KOver embeds two powerful WYSIWYG editors : The Designer and the Colour tool. Move, resize, change content and colours ... make it yours !

KOver (for KODI Overlay) offers a different approach of KODI skins. Not just purely designed, it also offers to the user the possibility to customize it and make thousands of configurations. KOver embeds two powerful WYSIWYG editors : The Designer and the Color tool. Move, resize, change content and colors ... make it yours !

KOver (KODI Overlay) tarjoaa erilaisen lähestymistavan KODIn ulkoasuihin. Se antaa käyttäjälle mahdoillisuuden muokata käyttöliittymää tuhansilla eri tavoilla. KOverin mukana tulee kaksi monipuolista WYSIWYG-editoria: suunnittelutyökalu ja värityökalu. Siirrä, muuta kokoa, muokkaa sisältöä ja värejä... Tee siitä omanlaisesi!

KOver (pour KODI Overlay) offre une approche différente des skins KODI. Plus qu'un simple habillage, les utilisateurs peuvent entièrement modifier son apparence et créer des milliers de configurations. KOver intègre deux éditeurs graphiques puissants : Le Designer et l'éditeur de couleurs. Déplacez, redimensionnez, changez les contenus et les couleurs ... faites en votre skin !

KOver (da KODI Overlay) offre un diverso approccio per le skin di KODI. Non solo puramente progettata, offre anche all'utente la possibilità di personalizzare e fare migliaia di configurazioni. KOver incorpora due potenti editor WYSIWYG: lo strumento Designer e quello Colore. Sposta, ridimensiona, cambia contenuto e colori... rendila tua!

KOver (KODI Overlay) siūlo kitokį požiūrį į KODI temines išvizdas. Ne tik skaidriai sukurta, bet ir siūlo vartotojui galimybę pritaikyti pagal savo poreikius suteikiant tūkstančius galimų konfigūracijų. KOver turi du galingus WYSIWYG redaktorius: dizainerį ir spalvų įrankį. Perkelkite, pakeiskite dydį, pakeiskite turinį ir spalvas ... susikurkite savo!

KOver (untuk Tindihan Atas KODI) menyediakan pelbagai pendekatan untuk kulit KODI. Bukan sahaja semata-mata direka, ia juga menawarkan keupayaan menyuai dan menghasilkan beribu-ribu konfigurasi. KOver membenamkan dua penyunting WYSIWYG yang hebat : Pereka dan alat Warna. Alih, saiz semula, ubah kandungan dan warna ... jadikan kulit tersebut hasil ciptaan anda !

Kover (para KODI Overlay) oferece uma abordagem diferente das demais skins para Kodi. Não apenas puramente projetada, mas também oferece ao usuário a possibilidade de personalizá-lo e fazer milhares de configurações. Kover incorpora dois poderosos editores WYSIWYG: O Designer e a ferramenta Color. Mova, redimensione, altere conteúdos e cores ... Faça você mesmo!
